Html:
First, let me say that you have my eternal thanks for creating this.

I cannot get BibWord Extender to launch. I have tried putting the .exe file in multiple locations, and I have tried 1.2 and 1.1. No matter what I do, I get the following error: "The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135)."

Is there something I've done wrong?
Do you have version 3.5 of the .Net framework installed?

I have installed it now. BibWord Extender runs, and reports success, but the file remains unchanged. Is there another step I've left out?

[Edit] Problem resolved. Thanks again, this really has saved me a lot of time! [/edit]
